#include<stdio.h>
#include<queue>
#include<algorithm>
#include<string>
#include<math.h>
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define MAX 100000000000
#define M 1000000007
#define scll(t) cin>>t
#define scl(t) cin>>t
#define max(a,b) a>b?a:b
#define min(a,b) a<b?a:b
#define ll long long
using namespace std;
int main()
{

    ll n,i,k;


        scll(n);
        ll a[n+1],d[n+1];
        for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
            scll(a[i]);
        for(i=0;i<=n;i++)
            d[i]=INFINITY;
        d[0]=d[1]=0;
        for(i=2;i<=n;i++)
        {
            for(k=1;k<=i;k*=2)
            {
                d[i]=min(d[i],abs(a[i]-a[i-k])+d[i-k]);
            }
        }

        printf("%lld",d[n]);

    return 0;
}
